name: Chin Men NFT Game
description: Chin Men NFT Game is an online PLAY-TO-EARN platform shooter. Play as any chin man character you own in your wallet. Every player gets a default chin man to start with. Battle it out with  bots or online players. Play with friends and show off your sexy chins. Earn daily rewards to win exclusive chin men NFTs and tokens! Become the most savage chin man out there!
